entry.title: [SQ] Anyone know what happened to [A New Radical Centrism](https://web.archive.org/we
entry.content:
Anyone know what happened to [A New Radical Centrism](https://web.archive.org/web/20220420073405/https://twitter.com/a_centrism)? (Posted an old archive link for clarity about who they are).
I assume they got banned for breaking Twitter's content rules on race and trans stuff. Do they have a new landing site?
